covertcloak.name: Covert Cloak
covertcloak.desc: The holder is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack. Attacks with secondary effects that are prevented include those with a chance (even 100%) to paralyze, sleep, freeze, burn, poison, confuse, cause the holder to flinch, cause the holder's stat stages to be lowered, as well as Anchor Shot, Eerie Spell, Fling, Psychic Noise, Salt Cure, Spirit Shackle, Syrup Bomb, and Throat Chop. The effect of Sparkling Aria is prevented if the holder is the only target. Secondary effects added by King's Rock, Razor Fang, and the Poison Touch, Stench, and Toxic Chain Abilities are also prevented against the holder.
covertcloak.shortDesc: Holder is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

whippeddream.name: Whipped Dream
whippeddream.desc: Evolves Swirlix into Slurpuff when traded.
whippeddream.shortDesc: Evolves Swirlix into Slurpuff when traded.

whiteherb.name: White Herb
whiteherb.desc: Restores all lowered stat stages to 0 when one is less than 0. Single use.
whiteherb.shortDesc: Restores all lowered stat stages to 0 when one is less than 0. Single use.

widelens.name: Wide Lens
widelens.desc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.
widelens.shortDesc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.

wikiberry.name: Wiki Berry
wikiberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.
wikiberry.shortDesc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.

yacheberry.name: Yache Berry
yacheberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.
yacheberry.shortDesc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.

zapplate.name: Zap Plate
zapplate.desc: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Electric type.
zapplate.shortDesc: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Electric type.

zoomlens.name: Zoom Lens
zoomlens.desc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.2x if it moves after its target.
zoomlens.shortDesc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.2x if it moves after its target.

berry.name: Berry
berry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
berry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

berserkgene.name: Berserk Gene
berserkgene.desc: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.
berserkgene.shortDesc: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.

bitterberry.name: Bitter Berry
bitterberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.
bitterberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.

burntberry.name: Burnt Berry
burntberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.
burntberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.

goldberry.name: Gold Berry
goldberry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
goldberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

iceberry.name: Ice Berry
iceberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.
iceberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.

mintberry.name: Mint Berry
mintberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.
mintberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

miracleberry.name: Miracle Berry
miracleberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.
miracleberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.

mysteryberry.name: Mystery Berry
mysteryberry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.
mysteryberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.

przcureberry.name: PRZ Cure Berry
przcureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.
przcureberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.

psncureberry.name: PSN Cure Berry
psncureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.
psncureberry.shortDesc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.
